fields.value: Bureau of Economic Analysis Price Indices, 1963-1975

authorName.value: UCLA Research Program in Competition and Business Policy

authorAffiliation.value: UCLA. Anderson Graduate School of Management.

dsDescriptionValue.value: These datasets contain price indices for 1963 through 1975 for 4-digit, 3-digit, and 2-digit industries prepared by the Bureau of Economic research (BEA). The dataset is formatted for simplicity. Each record is uniquely associated with a particular industry. Variables include the BEA code for data type, BEA durability code, Industry code or product class code, ISP sector code, Year, Current dollar value of shipments, Constant dollar value of shipments, Index of constant dollar values of shipments, and Implicit price deflators.

fields.value: Subject: STANDARD DEPOSIT TERMS 1.0 Type: DATAPASS:TERMS:STANDARD:1.0 Notes: of the Archive), within the Data Preservation Alliance for the Social Sciences ("Data-PASS") in accordance with the Data-PASS terms (the "Terms") of use (available from: http://www.icpsr.org/Data-PASS).
